issue.title: [C++] IPC listener interface should allow receiving custom_metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-16131 is adding custom_metadata support to synchronous (blocking) IPC readers and writers, but the Listener class used for event-driven IPC readers needs enhancing as well.
